product_name: Grivel Master Mega Twin Gate Belay Kit
long_description: Master Mega Twin Gate Belay Kit is a great combo kit ideal for any climber. It includes the Grivel Master Belay device and the revolutionary new Grivel Mega HMS Twin Gate Locking Carabiner.
short_description: Master Mega Twin Gate Belay Kit is a great combo kit ideal for any climber. It includes the Grivel Master Belay device and the revolutionary new Grivel Mega HMS Twin Gate Locking Carabiner.
